data.title: The Life & Work of Stephen King - a staff-created list from Sno-Isle Libraries — Sno-Isle Libraries
data.meta_description: Stephen King is a highly acclaimed and prolific American author known for his contributions to the horror, supernatural fiction and suspense genres. Born on September 21, 1947 in Portland, Maine, King's writing career began in the early 1970s, and he has since become one of the most recognizable and influential authors in the world.
